attributes.comment:
Please don't raise the cost Adoptive families will have to incur if these increases
are passed. With the cost of Adoption being over $30,000 many families who want
to adopt a waiting child DON'T. These increases are not needed $545 for the I-600
form a simple piece of paper. We paid $140 for fingerprinting and had to drive to
Buffalo, that same day we went to our local police station to have fingerprinting
done for the FBI & the cost was only $15 for the same exact printing process so
why the need to raise the cost to $80 ???? We have taken out several loans
upped the limit on our credit cards and work overtime every day and weekend
hoping Praying that we'll have enough money to make our dream of Adopting a
child become reality. Instead of raising the cost how about offering Adoptive
families grants and low interest loans to make it easier for families wanting to
adopt.
Raising these cost will only cause problems in the process of Adopting and turn
away many who want to but can't afford to adopt.
Somewhere a Child Sits and Waits.
Please do the right thing "NO INCREASES IN THESE COST"

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Brian M. Kelley
